actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that none of the funds in the Employees' Compensation Fund shall be used to pay compensation, benefits, or expenses for individuals convicted of fraud or other violations in connection with benefits from such fund.

summary.text: Amends Federal civil service law to provide for the forfeiture of all entitlement to benefits for injuries at work for individuals convicted of fraud or other violations in connection with such benefits.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that none of the funds in the Employees' Compensation Fund shall be used to pay compensation, benefits, or expenses for individuals convicted of fraud or other violations in connection with benefits from such fund.
